summary: Completed comprehensive testing of the unified V2 API amendments system across all 5 governance editor pages. All backend endpoints are working correctly for creating amendments and retrieving revision history.
passed_tests: POST /api/governance/v2/records/{record_id}/amend endpoint creates amendments for all 5 module types (minutes, distribution, dispute, insurance, compensation)
GET /api/governance/v2/records/{record_id}/revisions endpoint returns revision history correctly
Amendment creation for finalized records works across all modules
Revision history shows proper version tracking (v1 -> v2)
Amendment API response contains required fields (record_id, revision_id, version) for frontend page refresh
All 5 editor pages use unified V2 API endpoints
Record finalization workflow before amendment creation
Proper cleanup of test records via void endpoint
success_percentage: Backend: 100% (34/34 tests passed), Frontend: Not tested (backend-only testing as requested)
